roleset.name: to sponsor together with another sponsor
roleset.note: COSPONSOR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'co-sponsor' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from cosponsor.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: Rep. Byron Dorgan ( D. , N.D . ) has introduced [a bill]-1 [*ICH*-1][*ICH*-2] in Congress , co-sponsored [*] -1 by Rep. Lee Hamilton ( D. , Ind. ) , that [*T*-3] would put the treasury secretary back on the board .
example.arg: by Rep. Lee Hamilton ( D. , Ind. )
